HPI 8227 Lancia Delta Integrale 16V 1990 Rallye Monte Carlo Winner D. Auriol/B. Occelli

3rd WRC win for Didier Auriol.
55th WRC win for Lancia.
2nd WRC win for Delta Integrale 16V.



The hard to miss [color=#FF0000]1890 1990[/color] on the door is for the 100th anniversary of the Automobile Club de Monaco. It was founded in 1890 as an association of cyclists and began to incorporate motorists in 1907.

Auriol & Occelli won 13 of the 28 stages outright and swapped the overall lead with Carlos Sainz through stage 22. They regained the overall lead on stage 23 and held it through the final 5 stages to take the win. It was the 1st win for Auriol in the new 16V and the 55th for Lancia as a manufacturer. It would take 16 years for another manufacturer to surpass this when Ford got their 56th win in 2006.
